name: Legacy of Kain: Soul Reaver Remastered
summary:
Experience Legacy of Kain: Soul Reaver in original form or with remastered graphics.

After the events of Blood Omen: Legacy of Kain, Kain has created a vampiric empire in the world of Nosgoth. One of Kain's children and underlings, Raziel, is disgraced and cast down by a jealous Kain after surpassing him by growing wings and woken up centuries after in a corrupted form to get revenge against his once-brothers.
